3: I am the butler of this estate.
I am here to protect the inheritance of the estate owner, Mr. Copperfield.
I am contacting you through a private channel, so this will have to be brief.
Simply, leave now when you still can. This is my advice.
We can't, we got a mission to finish, Mr. Butler. Speaking of, you know where that Ascendant is?
Oh well, speaking of, why would you contact us through a private channel?
You aren't a Corrupted, right? Then you can just come out and talk, we can even be friends!
Um... I meant to say... overly friendly...
Ah shucks, thought we'd get a helping hand or something.
We'll have to go with the original route and pass through the door.
Let's see if we can pry the gates open.
